successStories.name: Joseph Ageng'o
successStories.achievement: Electrical Engineering • Technical University of Kenya
successStories.story: With consistent mentoring from the Career Guidance Cell, Joseph focused on core STEM subjects, participated in county Olympiads, and developed analytical skills that secured him a top rank.

successStories.name: Isha Verma
successStories.story: Through tailored guidance in biology and chemistry, Isha received structured support for competitive exams and gained confidence via mock tests, workshops, and mentorship programs.

successStories.name: Rohan Malhotra
successStories.story: Rohan honed his legal aptitude, critical thinking, and interview skills under the mentorship of alumni lawyers, ultimately excelling in the national law entrance examination.

successStories.name: Ananya Singh
successStories.story: Ananya’s academic excellence and global exposure were nurtured through leadership programs, essay-writing workshops, and college application guidance, leading to a prestigious international scholarship.

successStories.name: Michael Omondi
successStories.story: Michael's passion for computer science was identified early. With SAT prep, essay coaching, and scholarship guidance, he earned a full ride to one of the world’s top universities.

successStories.name: Fatuma Hassan
successStories.story: Fatuma received intensive support in commerce subjects and professional exam prep, emerging as the top-performing accounting student in the country.
